name: GuruGuruBEATS_CigaGameJam_version
description:
GuruGuruBEATS

Game from Ciga GameJam 2019
 Created in 48 hours
 
Team XiaoTangYuan
 Members:
   HaoTian-Ding(Programmer)
   Huadi(Artist)
   Rodding(Artist)

Music : OMFG - Pancakes

Platform : Windows
Controls : 
Keyboard : Left / Right Arrows
XBox Controller : L Trigger / R Trigger
(UI can only clicked by mouse)

We created this rhythm game demo in 48 hours at Ciga Game Jam 2019 SHENZHEN
We're the winner and got the Best Awards in this event. (The prize was a box of Monster drinks)
Here is the Game Jam Version,you can download & play this for free.
We decided to continue GuruGuruBEATS project,
you may see the full version at steam or other platform later.

We only built Windows Application at the moment.
We're considering to make builds like Linux/OSX or iOS/Android in Full Version.

Ciga Game Jam Official site:
https://youxibd.com/gamejam
